metadata.description: He ruled over the largest empire in history. His invasions and raids are the stuff of legends and his stature remains unmatched. His story was forged in a harsh reality of life among the nomadic peoples of the steppe, where power was earned with brute force. Witness the bloody struggle of a young man, Temujin, as he avenges his father's death and becomes the emperor known as Genghis Khan!
metadata.name: Khan: The Perfect Warrior
